directions: Toss cheese and cornstarch in a medium heatproof bowl. Pour evaporated milk over and cook in microwave on high 1 minute. Whisk and continue to cook in 30-second increments, whisking in between, until melted and smooth (about 2 minutes total).
Once cheese has melted, stir in Rotel and hot sauce, if using, and microwave an additional 30 seconds. Stir to combine.
ingredients: 8 ounces grated yellow sharp cheddar (about 2 packed cups)
1 (10-ounce) can Rotel diced tomatoes and green chiles, drained, squeezed dry
title: 3-Ingredient Cheese Sauce
